nodes.text: Hail Leader was the callsign given to the leader of Hail Squadron during the Galactic Civil War. In 4 ABY, a commander led Hail Squadron around the time of the battle in the Haldeen sector. In 5 ABY, a pilot was designated this callsign during a battle with the 204th Imperial Fighter Wing over the planet Chadawa.
Hail Leader was first mentioned in the 2021 novel Victory's Price, written by Alexander Freed.
